content.rendered:
we CARE about
YOU!

we CARE about YOU!

At ExtremityCare®, our focus is on cell and tissue technologies that support the repair, reconstruction, replacement, or supplementation of the patient’s own tissue.

We provide compliant handling of allogeneic and xenograft tissue to and from your clinic with our careLOG™ shipping logistic.

Our team is there to support you throughout the ordering, shipping & handling process.

Placental
Tissue

Xenograft
Tissue

Conservative Wound Care

Acellular
Dermis

completeFT™ is a full Thickness Placental Membrane

completeFT™ is a placental tissue allograft that may be used as a protective barrier in wound care applications. The natural properties of amniotic tissue provide mechanical protection to support the management of acute and chronic wounds.

Read more

Allograft Logistic

careLOG™ is a patient-specific allograft shipping logistic. The package contains the allograft and all billing-related documents needed to request reimbursement.

Read more

Insurance Verification Process

Our team supports with verifying if insurance coverage is applicable.

1 Request Submission
2 Verification
3 Benefit Summary
4 Reimbursement Support
Read more

Disclaimer: Extremity Care offers insurance verification as an information service only. Information gathered during the requested research will be provided by the insurer or third-party payer. Results of this research are not a guarantee of coverage or reimbursement in the future. Extremity Care disclaims liability for payment of any claims, benefits, or costs.

Extremity Care does not guarantee payment, nor does insurance verification guarantee payment. Terms & Conditions apply. Extremity Care does not warrant the accuracy of the information provided. None of the content on this website should be interpreted as billing or reimbursement advice.
